title: Citi Named Leader in Corporate Banking in Asia by Greenwich Associates
summary: Citi has been named a leader in Corporate Banking in a study of Asia's leading corporates by Greenwich Associates. In a survey of 551 corporates, more than half said they viewed Citi as an important partner in offering corporate banking services to them.
tag-1: Citi Named Leader in Corporate Banking in Asia by Greenwich Associates
tag-2: Citi has been named a leader in Corporate Banking in a study of Asia's leading corporates by Greenwich Associates. In a survey of 551 corporates, more than half said they viewed Citi as an important partner in offering corporate banking services to them.
tag-3: On the back of the poll results, Greenwich Associates, a leading provider of data services, named Citi a leader in Large Corporate Banking Quality. The poll was based on interviews with CFOs and Treasurers at companies in China, Hong Kong, Singapore, South Korea, Taiwan, Thailand and Vietnam. Subjects covered included product demand, quality of coverage and capabilities in specific areas.
tag-4: Citi's corporate bank, which operates in more than 20 countries in Asia Pacific, offers corporate finance solutions to clients across the region.
tag-5: "This independent recognition is very welcome for the whole team in Asia who do an outstanding job in supporting our clients across this region. I would also like to thank our clients whose trust in Citi makes these awards possible," said Agnes Liew, Head of Corporate Banking for Asia Pacific.
tag-6: Citi's in country corporate banking and cash management services were also praised across a number of markets.

tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions.
